metadata.name: Growing from the Tree #1
metadata.description:
Humans are the children of nature. Same as trees. 
Trees take nutrients from the ground through their long and powerful roots. 
Just like trees, we get our energy and nutrients from the ground, but we use trees and plants as a mediator. 
Trees also make the vital oxygen we breathe.
If not for the natural world, there will be no us. Isnâ€™t it a good enough reason to take care of our beautiful planet?

The collector, if they wish, receives a physical copy with the certificate of authenticity.
If desired, I can mint the b&w version of this photo.
